name: Desert Eagle .50AE
description: The iconic Desert Eagle is a gas-operated, semi-automatic pistol known for being the largest magazine-fed self-loading pistol.

name: Glock 19 Gen 5
description: The GLOCK 19 Gen5 pistol in 9mm Luger is ideal for a more versatile role due to its reduced dimensions. The new frame design without finger grooves still allows to instantly customize its grip.

name: CZ Shadow 2
description: Designed for speed and accuracy in competition, the CZ Shadow 2 features a higher beaver tail and undercut trigger guard.

name: Sig Sauer P320
description: The P320 offers a smooth, crisp trigger to make any shooter more accurate, an intuitive, 3-point takedown and unmatched modularity.

name: Barrett M82A1
description: The first semi-automatic .50 caliber rifle, the M82A1 has been proven in every terrain from snow-covered mountains to desolate deserts.

name: Remington 700
description: The Remington Model 700 is a series of centerfire bolt-action rifles, legendary for its out-of-the-box accuracy.

name: Accuracy International AXMC
description: The AXMC is a multi-caliber bolt-action rifle designed for long-range precision in the toughest conditions.

name: CheyTac M200 Intervention
description: Considered the most accurate long-range rifle in the world, capable of hitting targets at over 2,000 yards.

name: Daniel Defense DDM4 V7
description: The DDM4 V7 features M-LOK attachment technology and a mid-length gas system for smooth cycling.

name: AK-47 Kalashnikov
description: The most famous assault rifle in history, known for its extreme durability and reliability in any environment.

name: SCAR 17S
description: The FN SCAR 17S is the benchmark for reliability and versatility in a 7.62mm caliber semi-auto rifle.

name: M4A1 Carbine
description: The standard issue carbine for many military forces, offering a compact design and proven performance.

name: 9mm Luger FMJ 115gr
description: Premium 9mm full metal jacket ammunition for training and target practice. 50 rounds per box.

name: 5.56x45mm NATO Green Tip
description: Bulk 5.56 NATO ammunition, 62 grain, M855 Green Tip. Great for long-range storage.

name: EOTech EXPS3 Holo Sight
description: The EXPS3 offers true two-eyes-open shooting and a 7mm raised base that allows for iron sight access.

name: Magpul PMAG 30 AR/M4
description: The PMAG 30 GEN M3 is a 30-round polymer magazine for AR15/M4 compatible weapons.
